name: Controller Wars 1D Alpha v0.6
description:
Hey. This is just a prototype and is being shared with you because you're *SPECIAL*. To learn more about the game see the details at http://redacted.org.uk/altctrl/controllerwars.html. It will work on Windows 7/8 but might not work on XP or Vista. If you have any questions let me know and I'll get straight back to you, I promise. Probably. Okay that's it.

--- Updated 03/09/14 to v0.5 ---

Doesn't need GlovePIE any more, because I finally remembered how to code.
Changed "except" to "even" in instructions.
